name: Again and Again
starterCode:
func make_a_tomato_soup() {

	GOTO("Pantry")
	GET("Broth")
	GOTO("Station 1")
	PLACE("A", 0)

	GOTO("Pantry")

	GET("Tomato")

	GOTO("Station 1")
	PLACE("A", 1)

	ACTIVATE("A")

	TAKE("A")

	GOTO("Window")

	DELIVER()

}



make_a_tomato_soup()

if (#orders - 1 >= 1) {

 var i = 0

	while (i < #orders - 1) {

		make_a_tomato_soup()

		i = i + 1

	}

}
